definition: dialogue (in a movie or a play)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: With these components, you are ready to begin the process of automatic dialogue replacement, " or "ADR" for short.
sentences.chinese: 藉助於這些資料，你便可以開始自動對白替換工作。

sentences.english: He writes dialog ue by cut monologue in two.
sentences.chinese: 他把獨白切成兩截來寫對白。

sentences.english: Step 7Add pacing and excitement to your story by sprinkling it with dialog.
sentences.chinese: 通過對白來調節故事的節奏，增加興奮點。

sentences.english: But why diminish all this with clunky dialogue?
sentences.chinese: 但是，爲什麼這部電影的對白確是笨拙？

sentences.english: Along with interest in music comes a greater awareness of culture.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨滅對音樂的亡味的是對白明更清晰的認識。

sentences.english: These early talkies are more reassuring as movies.
sentences.chinese: 這些早期的對白比電影更讓人覺得安心。

sentences.english: The Constant Gardener is talky and intelligent, and never takes the cheap way out.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影有很多對白，充滿智慧，而且從不俗氣老套。

sentences.english: Add pacing and excitement to your story by sprinkling it with dialog.
sentences.chinese: 通過對白來調節故事的節奏，增加興奮點。

sentences.english: And I even thought of a classic line to break up.
sentences.chinese: 我還想了一個經典的對白，能用來分手。

sentences.english: The scenes open with a kind of rhythmed dialogue which gradually rises into song.
sentences.chinese: 各場戲以一種有韻律的對白開始，再逐漸變成歌唱。

sentences.english: Give the actors examples of how the line needs to be delivered.
sentences.chinese: 在對白前的括號裏寫下演員在唸白時需要表達的情感。

sentences.english: Recite your re-worked dialogue and time it.
sentences.chinese: 再次吟誦修改過的對白並計時。

sentences.english: The results of this study demonstrate that sodium pyrithione has an effect of inhibiting Candida albicans in vivo and in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 本研究證明吡硫黴淨對白念珠菌確有抑菌作用。

sentences.english: You will hear some dialogues that take place during her party.
sentences.chinese: 你將會聽到在她生日舞會上發生的一些對白。

sentences.english: Write the emotion the actor needs to use when delivering the line in parentheses in front of the line.
sentences.chinese: 在對白前的括號裏寫下演員在唸白時需要表達的情感。

definition: script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
from start to finish/from head to tail/the whole (thing)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
